name: Tribal Broadband Connectivity Program
objective: This program provides grants to eligible tribal or Native entities in the United States to expand access to and adoption of broadband service on Tribal land or remote learning, telework, or telehealth resources.
applicant_types: Native American Organizations (includes Indian groups, cooperatives, corporations, partnerships, associations)

authorizations.text: IX, 905(c), The Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2021, Division N. 134 Stat. 1182 (Dec. 27, 2020). Pub. L. 116, 260.
Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act of 2021, Division F, Title I, 60102. 135 Stat. 429. Pub. L. 117-58.
